Key Match Events: Nitish Kumar Reddy took the final wicket of Mahmudullah
Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage
India's attacking template set by Rohit Sharma and Rahul Dravid was highlighted
Bangladesh captain Najmul Hossain Shanto admitted that his batters do not know how to score 180 in a T20I
Mahmudullah to retire from T20Is after series against India
Post-Match Reflections: Arshdeep Singh commented on the pitch in Delhi
Mahmudullah defended his team's performance and emphasized the need to be more organized
Miscellaneous Highlights: The weather should be clear with little chance of dew
Bangladesh have beaten India only once in 15 meetings in T20Is
Suryakumar Yadav averages 2.01 sixes per innings in T20I cricket
Hardik Pandya and Arshdeep Singh are fourth and fifth on the list of most T20I wickets for India
Litton Das is 53 runs short of becoming the third Bangladesh batter to score 2000 T20I runs
Shanto needs 65 runs to reach 1000 T20I runs
